text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao xiedu zhenzhu de biaozhi he jin yue, buyao qinfan zuo xisheng yong de shengchu, buyao pohuai naxie shengchu de xiangquan, buyao shanghai chaojin jin si yi qiu zhu de enhui he xiyue de ren. Dang nimen kai jie de shihou, keyi dalie. Youren ceng zuzhi nimen jin jin si, nimen jue buyao wei yuanhen tamen erguo fen. Nimen dang wei zhengyi he jingwei er huzhu, buyao wei zui'e he hengbao er huzhu. Nimen dang jingwei zhenzhu, yin wei zhenzhu de xingfa que shi yanli de.
